thread.title: Ghanaian quartet at TP Mazembe to play USM Alger in African Champions League final
thread.title_full: Ghanaian quartet at TP Mazembe to play USM Alger in African Champions League final

title: Ghanaian quartet at TP Mazembe to play USM Alger in African Champions League final
text:
17:25 CET Ghanaian quartet at TP Mazembe to play USM Alger in African Champions League final - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
TP Mazembe Englebert of the Democratic Republic of Congo blazed through to the African Champions League final with a 3-0 win in Sunday’s semifinal second leg over Al Merreikh of Sudan in Lubumbashi to set up a final meeting with USM Alger. 
Mazembe completed a comfortable 4-2 aggregate triumph as they overcame a deficit from last weekend’s first leg. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us I don’t think there is a woman who has not suffered heartbreak in one form or the other. By: FRANCIS TAWIAH ,
